_xResult.title: Fall from the Sky Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made cocktail dress with flared skirt
_xResult.longdesc:
If you are wanting to feel red carpet ready, look no further than this elegant fit n’ flare dress. The Ombre effect of the fabric, fading from black to speckled gold, gives off the essence of a creative explosion—the falling of stars, if you will. With a generous neckline and ballooned skirt, this made to measure piece is perfect for the most exquisite of occasions.


You need a dress made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
